Title: AN ACT TO AMEND PARAGRAPH (C), SUBSECTION A OF SECTION ONE OF ACT NUMBERED FORTY-ONE HUNDRED AND EIGHTY.
Data:
[ Acts No. 4228, August 10, 1935 ]
AN ACT TO AMEND PARAGRAPH (C), SUBSECTION A OF SECTION ONE OF ACT NUMBERED FORTY-ONE HUNDRED AND EIGHTY.
Be it enacted by the Senate and. House of Representatives of the Philippines in Legislature assembled and by the authority of the same:
Section 1. Paragraph (c), subsection A of section one of Act Numbered Forty-one hundred and eighty, otherwise known as the Public Works Act of nineteen hundred and thirty-five, is hereby amended so that item 15, under caption Palawan, shall read as follows:
"15. For the Balala Elementary School, Culion ..................... P1,000.00"
Section 2. This Act shall take effect on the date of its approval.1a—àphi1
Approved, August 10, 1935.
